property.name: Text
property.value: Heroes attacking this castle cannot gain Strength bonuses from other cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle, 1 Food (fromt his castle): Create one 1S/1W/0R Peasant Levy hero in your army at this battle for each unit in the opposing army. Bury them at the end of combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bow this card. Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Replace them in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle, X food (from this castle): Each hero at this battle gets -X Strength until the end of this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit cannot assign to battle. Displaced heroes (even other players') have an additional Carry +1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bard-Maestro of the Pennywhistle

property.name: Text
property.value: When buried, this card absorbs 3 damage (instead of 1; this does not grant it immunity).

property.name: Text
property.value: Autumn: Bury your target spell, cohort or item. Add a +1S marker and a food token to your target hero. Gain 1 Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Costs 2 gold less while being attached to a Zealous hero. Battle: Bow this card and target a hero. Reveal the top card of your deck. If the Fate value of the revealed card is higher than that of the target, bow that hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Bow this card to target a defending hero. The target may not engage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card absorbs damage from an engagement, do not bury it. If this card absorbed damage during a battle, bury it at the end of the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a food token absorbs damage from an engagement by this cohort, that player must destroy an additional food token (first absorbs all damage, then destroy extra food tokens).

property.name: Text
property.value: This card's Strength equals the number of food tokens on it. Summer: Move 1 food token from your castle to this card. Summer: Move all food tokens from this card to your castles. Bury this card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guardian of the Pure

property.name: Text
property.value: This card absorbs damage with Will rather than Strength.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guardian of Nuclear Magic

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Look at the top card of your deck. Battle: Destroy this card. Give a target hero -2W.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guardian of Dark Arts-Unique

property.name: Text
property.value: This card is never immune. When it absorbs damage, return it to your hand. React: After defenders have assigned, move this unit into a battle.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guardian of the Three

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Move to an army that has another Power of Three. Battle: Engage this hero (and other cards desires). Do one additional damage for each other Power of Three in this army. Raid: Gain an additional Carry +1 for each other Power of Three you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guardian of the Three

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Move to an army that has another Power of Three. Battle: Engage this hero (and other cards desires). Do one additional damage for each other Power of Three in this army. Raid: Gain an additional Carry +1 for each other Power of Three you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guardian of the Three

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Move to an army that has another Power of Three. Battle: Engage this hero (and other cards desires). Do one additional damage for each other Power of Three in this army. Raid: Gain an additional Carry +1 for each other Power of Three you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bury this hero. Players cannot attack, raid, or complete a quest this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: After this hero bows to a summon a guardian, discard the top card of your deck. If its Fate value is even, the guardian gains a +2S/+2W token, otherwise give it a -1S token.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After an effect targets your hero in the current battle, it targets this hero instead (if this hero is a legal target).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opposing card engaged in this battle, move this hero home, without bowing, before deciding how to absorb damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bow this card. Discards a card. Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one in your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this hero summons a guardian, you may bury him to reduce the guardian's food and gold cost to zero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Move this hero into an army that has one of your wizards in it.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Displaced-Raid +1

property.name: Text
property.value: May not redistribute food during Winter. If this hero has 4 or more food tokens, bury him immediately. Raid: Bow this hero. Place one food token on him from this castle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: If this hero is opposed, discard a card to add its Fate value to the Strength of this hero. Battle: Target an opposing hero with lower Strength. Bow this hero. Bury the target.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target a property. If it bows for gold this turn, it produces 1 additional gold. React: When you need to reveal or discard a card from your deck for it's Fate value, you can use another player's deck instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heroes with lower Glory cannot absorb damage from this hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever you complete a quest, add 1 food to one of your castles.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Ixhasa-Bard-Maestro of the Voice

property.name: Text
property.value: Undead cohorts in this army have +1S. Battle: Give an opposing hero -1S/-1W.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer/Battle: Discard a card. Target hero gets +1 Strength, +1 Will, and +1 Glory.

property.name: Production
property.value: Bows for 1 Gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Discard a card to give a target hero Brutal. If you targeted this card, you may engage it (with any other cards in this unit that you wish).

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: This hero gets -2 Strength. Draw 1 card. Add 1 food token to a castle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Engage this hero and its attached cohorts as desired. Increase the Strength of the engagement by +2. This army (including castles and food, if defending) takes 1 damage.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Ord-Chancellor-Spy Master

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Discard the top card of an opponent's deck. If it matches your stronghold's Fate value, your heroes in this battle gain +1S and you may take an additional action. If it does not, each opposing hero suffers -1S.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play this hero, if you are not a Shad-Hujem player, you must bury a target hero you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: After this card enters play, each other player reveals a random card from his or her hand. If it is a hero, bury it.

property.name: Text
property.value: In a duel, heroes cannot thrust with cards from hand that have a Fate value equal to this hero's.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: When this hero wins a duel, give her a +4S until the end of the turn.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tuatha-Fae-Unseelie-Duelist-Raid +1

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: One target hero gets a +1 or -1 Fate value until the end of the turn.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tuatha-Fae-Of the Blood

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After your hero wins a duel, straighten that hero and draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: This hero suffers -2S. Target another of your heroes, who duels another target hero. Bow (do not bury) the loser. Battle: Duel a target Unique opposing personality.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: One target hero gets +1S or -1S.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this hero enters play, target an item in play that he could legally attach. You may attach it to him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Move any number of your target units home. This hero may perform this action even when he is not at the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this hero assigns to an army, discard the top card of an opponent's deck. If the Fate value is 3, that player adds the card to their hand, and this hero joins their army until the battle ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Autumn: Target player loses 3 Renown. Gain 1 food token on your target castle. Bury this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When attached, you may give control of this hero to another player. This hero has -2S while attacking. Each Winter, this hero's controller moves a food token from his or her castle onto this hero. This hero cannot redistribute food tokens. When this card is buried, control of the hero reverts to its owner. Summer: Target Evan's Triplecross on a hero you own but do not control. Bury Evan's Triplecross on both heroes.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Holy-Hat-Raid +1

property.name: Text
property.value: This hero cannot be targeted by a player with Undead cohorts or heroes.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this card is buried, bury all heroes that you control but do not own. Battle: Target a hero buried during this battle. Bring that hero into your army, bowed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Bury this card. Each hero in this army gains +1 Strength. If you are the defender, food tokens on this castle absorb 2 points of damage each.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Engage this hero (and other cards as desired). If the opposing army has more units than your army, this hero engages using Will instead of Strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Engage this hero and target an opposing cohort or hero with equal or lower Strength. The target must absorb the damage (it cannot declare immunity).

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After thrust and parry cards are revealed in a duel, reduce the value of either card by 1.

property.name: Production
property.value: Bows for 1 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bow this card and target a property in your discard that costs 3 gold or less. Play the target, bowed, ignoring all costs.

property.name: Production
property.value: Bows for 3 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows to produce 2 gold when paying for a spell or guardian; discard 1 food if you do this.

property.name: Production
property.value: Bows for 1 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bury this card. For the rest of the turn, place 1 food token on a castle each time you win a duel.

property.name: Production
property.value: Bows for 1 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Complete after your hero wins a duel against a hero who started the duel with a higher Will.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Completed Quest-Token

property.name: Text
property.value: Add 2 food tokens to this card. Autumn: Move a food token from this card to one of your castles. You may use this action twice per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Complete after a hero you control is buried by an ability on one of your cards. Summer: Bury your target unbowed hero.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Completed Quest-Token

property.name: Text
property.value: Autumn: Decrease each player's Renown by the gold cost of the hero that was buried to complete this quest. Bury this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, 1 food: When your target hero moves or returns home from a battle, negate that hero's bowing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target your castle with at least one food token. Reveal the top card of your deck. If its Fate value is 2 or less, destroy a food token on the target; if it's a 3 or 4, add a food token to the target; if it's a 5 or higher, bury this card, each other player destroys a food token, and add a food token to the target. Discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Autumn: Bow this wizard. Bury a target bowed hero with Will equal to or lower than this wizard's Will. Discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows for 4 gold. Your wizards in the same location as a guardian gain +1S. React: When summoning a guardian, reduce its gold and food cost by one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows for 3 gold. Once per duel, you may thrust from the top of your deck instead of from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: If this army has more units but less total Strength than the opposing army, your target hero gains +3S for the rest of the battle. Engage that hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Your target unbowed hero and a target opposing hero begin a duel. Raid: Your target hero and a target opposing hero in this raid begin a duel. Send the loser home, bowed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target a castle. It cannot use battle abilities this turn. Destroy it at the end of any battle there if it has no food and an enemy unit was present. Autumn: Target a castle. Permanently increase its storage by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Autumn: Target an opposing hero with one or more food tokens. Create a 1 might, 3 storage Scenery castle token. Place all food from that hero on the token castle. Bury this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raid: Target your defending hero and destroy one or more target food tokens on this castle. The target hero gains an additional Carry +1 and Raid +2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target your unbowed hero and another player's hero. Your hero duels the other target. Before the duel, the other player chooses whether the loser is buried, or the winner gains 3 food tokens among his or her castles.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target an unbowned hero. Its controller must bow the target or give it a -1W token.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you reveal this card as a parry or thrust in a duel, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: For the rest of this turn, each time a hero, cohort or item is buried, add one food token to a castle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Target your unbowed attacking hero. Gain food tokens on one of your castles equal to its Strength. Bury the target hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raid: Move your target unbowed unit into a raid where you have a unit. It does not play a stealth card, but adds its Raid bonus, if any. If raiding, both heroes may steal food if successful.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Bow your target hero with Raid +1 or higher and Strength less than each opposing hero. End the battle. Units return home unbowed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Bow a target card in an opposing unit. Battle: Bow a target card in an opposing unit, even if you have no units in that battle. Discard food equal to the target's food cost

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play after another player targets your hero ability or tactic card at a battle. Bow a target unbowed hero in your army with higher Glory than the original target. The ability affects the target hero you bowed instead of the original target.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Raid another player. You may assign up to X units to raid. Autumn: Attack a target castle. You may assign up to X units to attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: When an opponent uses an ability on a spell or item, you choose all targets (they must be legal targets for the ability).

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target and reveal two heroes (other than guardians) in your hand. X is the total gold cost of both heroes. Play them both (ignoring gold and food costs).

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target a property. The target cannot bow or use abilities this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Engage your target hero and its attached cohorts as desired. The target has a +1S if it is a Wizard. Heroes must absorb this damage before food tokens can.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Target your hero at the current battle. Add a 2S/1W/0R unaligned Purple Ninja hero token to that army. Bury it at the end of battle. You may pay 1 food to place this card on the bottom of your deck instead of in the discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Until Autumn, your target hero may assign while bowed. Autumn: Your target Displaced hero may raid while bowed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Autumn: Bow your target hero. Place your target buried hero into your hand. Summer: Bury a target guardian.
